org.osmdroid.tileprovider.tilesource

Class MapBoxTileSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.osmdroid.tileprovider.tilesource.BitmapTileSourceBase
      • org.osmdroid.tileprovider.tilesource.OnlineTileSourceBase
        • org.osmdroid.tileprovider.tilesource.MapBoxTileSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITileSource

    public class MapBoxTileSource
extends OnlineTileSourceBase
    MapBox tile source, revised in 5.1 to not use static map ids or tokens

      MapBoxTileSource(String name, int zoomMinLevel, int zoomMaxLevel, int tileSizePixels, String imageFilenameEnding)
      TileSource allowing majority of options (sans url) to be user selected.

      TileSource allowing all options to be user selected.
      MapBoxTileSource(String mapboxid, String accesstoken)
      creates a new mapbox tile source, using the specified access token and mapbox id

    • Constructor Detail

      • MapBoxTileSource

        public MapBoxTileSource()
        Creates a MapBox TileSource. You won't be able to use it until you set the access token and map id.

      • MapBoxTileSource

        creates a new mapbox tile source, loading the access token and mapid from the manifest

        Since:

      • MapBoxTileSource

        public MapBoxTileSource(String name,
                        int zoomMinLevel,
                        int zoomMaxLevel,
                        int tileSizePixels,
                        String imageFilenameEnding)
        TileSource allowing majority of options (sans url) to be user selected.
        Warning, the static method #retrieveMapBoxMapId(android.content.Context) should have been invoked once before constructor invocation
        Parameters:
        name - Name
        zoomMinLevel - Minimum Zoom Level
        zoomMaxLevel - Maximum Zoom Level
        tileSizePixels - Size of Tile Pixels
        imageFilenameEnding - Image File Extension

      • MapBoxTileSource

        public MapBoxTileSource(String name,
                        int zoomMinLevel,
                        int zoomMaxLevel,
                        int tileSizePixels,
                        String imageFilenameEnding,
                        String mapBoxMapId,
                        String mapBoxVersionBaseUrl)
        TileSource allowing all options to be user selected.
        Warning, the static method #retrieveMapBoxMapId(android.content.Context) should have been invoked once before constructor invocation
        Parameters:
        name - Name
        zoomMinLevel - Minimum Zoom Level
        zoomMaxLevel - Maximum Zoom Level
        tileSizePixels - Size of Tile Pixels
        imageFilenameEnding - Image File Extension
        mapBoxVersionBaseUrl - MapBox Version Base Url @see https://www.mapbox.com/developers/api/#Versions
